item.description:
Howdy! Bobby Carlson and Stones River is gonna rock the bar this Saturday nite...Midnight Rodeo Bar.  If you are looking to meeting new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time! 
$10.00 cover charge
21 +
Lessons with Michelle at 7:30 PM, Band goes on at 9 PM

DJ Rich....between sets! 

 Welcome new members Katrina Vachon and also Kelly!  hope to see you soon!

Hi Guys, I really hope you can join us again for our All Day Dance workshop on June 16th !! There is only one more week to register before there is a $10 late registration fee. Gail Eaton will be teaching the experienced class and Michelle Jackson will be teaching the beginner class. I have attached the registration form. Thanks, Debbie Midnight Rodeo Bar 1 Attached file| 173KB
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign on a table to the right of the room before the bar
item.name: Line and Partner Dancing
